name: Fallen London: My Kingdom for a Pig
storyline: A pox has spread across London! Join a crack team of conspirators to infiltrate a high-stakes auction and delve beneath a fungal vineyard in search of a cure. What will you find in the Fifth City's deepest cellars?
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2019. Second entry in the Season of Bargains.
